text: Here's an update we sent out today regarding the many developments on the campaign front: http://www.tedcruz.org/update/ #tcot #yct #rs
Important WSJ editorial: Never in our memory has so unpopular a bill been on the verge of passing Congress. http://bit.ly/56XRFQ #HCR PLS RT
@CarlosAmaral thanks for the #followfriday... hope you and all the other great Republicans in Collin County are doing well!
Obama's plan to "spend our way out of this recession" is a little like Tiger saying he can date his way out of his problem. #tcot #teaparty
Enthusiastic, large crowd last night at Collin Co. Conservative GOP Christmas Party. Warriors for liberty in the great reawakening. #tcot
Speaking tonite at Collin County Conservative Republicans Christmas Party. 7:00 at Pantry Restaurant in McKinney. If in area, stop by!
Heidi and I wish you and your family a wonderful Thanksgiving and that you may all enjoy the blessings of liberty. More: http://bit.ly/AfJuU
Looking forward to speaking to Texas Federation of Republican Women (TFRW) Sun. in Galveston. These women are heart and soul of GOP.
To our veterans, we owe our gratitude, our admiration and importantly our commitment to continue the fight for freedom. More: bit.ly/AfJuU
Today, we remember those brave men and women who have risked so much to defend our Nation. More: bit.ly/AfJuU
This week marked anniversary of critical milestone for freedom-fall of Berlin Wall, wonderful testament to liberty. http://bit.ly/AfJuU
Campaigning in E.TX-spoke to Nacogdoches GOP Women and visited w/ patriots in Lufkin. Now in Tyler-campaign receiving tremendous response...
...and remain grateful for the brave men and women in uniform who serve every day to protect our liberty.
Our hearts all mourn for the victims of today's tragic shooting at Fort Hood. Let’s keep their family and loved ones in our prayers...
Now driving to Collin County to speak to a wonderful gathering of the Conservative Hispanic Society... stop by if you're in the area. #tcot
Spoke to statewide meeting of Associated General Contractors (AGC) in Austin... terrific group of entrepreneurs helping drive our economy.
Join Alamo Circle by contributing just $25 a month. Play significant role, regardless of financial means. Thx! http://bit.ly/TdVq3 Pls RT
Join Alamo Circle: https://secure.piryx.com/donate/MuvqSNzw/tedcruz/. Give $25 a month, make a real difference for campaign. #tcot #rs #yct
Pls join our new Alamo Circle-make monthly, recurring payments and really help out, regardless of your financial means. http://bit.ly/3kT0b0
@BillRider and @dodrummond - Thx for the #followfriday mentions! Hope everyone will keep up with campaign on twitter, web: www.tedcruz.org
Please join our AG campaign's FB Page: www.facebook.com/tedcruzpage. And pls share w/ friends? Thx for spreading the word! #tcot #fb
Great to speak to MavPAC in Hou...encouraging to see leaders of the new generation enthusiastic about preserving freedom, opportunity. #tcot
@RaulEspinoza thanks for the #followfriday mention!
Spoke to Amarilllo #GOP Women Mon. We continue to see an awakening--people hungry for leaders to stand up and defend liberty. #tcot #txcot
@cabrales good to see you more active on twitter! @taraross and @CarlosAmaral - always appreciate the RTs and mentions... thx!
Another op/ed on imperiled vets memorial: "Standing in for our war dead in a lonely desert" http://bit.ly/6TCtd #scotus #constitution #tcot
Op/ed in WSJ by me, Kelly Shackelford on #scotus case re. cross-shaped vets memorial ACLU wants to tear down. http://bit.ly/3SiCjX #tcot #rs
New video clip of remarks to State Republican Executive Committee (SREC). Hope you'll view, RT. http://bit.ly/6u8FX
On Mon, spoke to Magic Circle GOP Women in Houston. Tremendous group of ladies fighting for #GOP values for a long time. Honor to join them.
Honored to be endorsed by majority of SREC across TX, so many hard working GOP leaders. Momentum building. http://bit.ly/2OCw6F Pls RT #tcot
Speaking to Ector County #GOP Women in Odessa Monday. Very much looking forward to it. If you're in area, pls join us. www.ecrw.net #tcot
Thurs speaking @ Galveston Island Pachyderm Club at 12, Gaido's, 3802 Seawall Blvd. Spirit of Freedom GOP Women at 7, Ft. Bend Chamber.
Am speaking today at Northwest Forest GOP Women in Houston. 11:30 am at 12716 Cutten Road. If you're in town, please join us. www.nwfrw.org
Reminder to join us today at 4:45 for Fort Worth rally - rain or shine. Hope to see you there! www.912ftw.org/ #tcot #teaparty
9/11 demonstrated incredible resilience of American ppl, and best of nation. Keep military in our prayers as we stand together for freedom.
Join us Sat at 4:45 for Fort Worth rally. Hear about how liberties are threatened and new leadership to defend them. www.912ftw.org/ #tcot
RT @RedState: Ted Cruz gaining momentum in Texas AG race http://bit.ly/36TdXW #TCOT #RS
Very kind blog post on Houston Chron web site by @RWSparkle about our campaign. Pls check it out: http://bit.ly/c88VI #tcot #txcot
In Houston Tue evening? Join us at TX Tea Party GOP Women. Honored to speak to such champions for liberty. www.ttprw.org #teaparty #txcot
In Collin County this Monday? Join us for Labor Day Rally at Frisco City Hall. I'll speak at 1:00PM. http://bit.ly/lPnx9 #teaparty #tcot
@frankreilly and @LisaMallory, great to see you at the GOP Club of Austin yesterday. Really appreciate the kind words. On to victory! #tcot
Terrific young pro event last night in Austin. Over 100 ppl ready to stand up for liberty. Thx for coming! Others, pls join: tedcruz.org.
Save the date- If you're around Collin County, join us for a 9/7 Labor Day Rally at Frisco City Hall. More details soon. #teaparty #tcot
@BriannaBecker and @JennaAWhite, thx for RT of great editorial on our campaign. Hope everyone will read it: http://bit.ly/zNJay. #yct
Terrific editorial on campaign in Tyler paper: Candidate Cruz May Pique Voter Interest. Pls check out, RT. Thx! http://bit.ly/zNJay #tcot
@DubyaWilliamson and @johnjriewe, thanks for the RTs about our Boerne event. Good to see you guys at the YR gala in College Station. #tyrf
Large, enthusiastic crowd in Boerne, TX last night. Clearly hungry for new leadership. Thx to everyone for coming out. Pls join: tedcruz.org
Heading to Boerne, Texas to speak to the Kendall County Republican Club this evening... #tcot #txcot #gop
Grateful for support of 50+ Texas Federation of Republican Women leaders. Reflects remarkable statewide grassroots team.http://bit.ly/32rP1Q
Great to see so many enthusiastic Young Republicans at gala in College Station ready to work hard and fight for our freedom. #TYRF09
Looking forward to speaking at the Texas Young Republican Federation Gala Dinner this Saturday in College Station... #gop #txcot
Brief video clip of remarks to Texas Municipal Police Association. Hope you'll check it out and pass along. Thx! http://tr.im/vzCI
Just spoke at RedState.com gathering. Terrific reception. Really encouraging to be with so many warriors for liberty. #rs #tcot #yct
@profg Understand your frustation, but I'm running on a proven record of fighting for liberty and winning: www.tedcruz.org/provenRecord.html
Kind letter from GOP stalwarts Ernie Angelo, Penny Butler & George Strake. Could you pls contribute $25? Thx! http://tr.im/uUAe #tcot
We had a terrrific fundraiser in DC last week.  Over 100 in attendance; many old friends, lots of excitement.  Very encouraging.
Great to be with many enthusiastic supporters at a terrific Lubbock Area Republican Women's lunch today. Thx for your kind hospitality!
Speaking to the Lubbock Area Republican Women luncheon tomorrow (7/16). Stop by if you're in the area: http://tr.im/srLG #txcot #txgop
Release on endorsements from more than two dozen statewide, national conservative leaders: http://tr.im/s9aD #tcot #teaparty #yct
Video at E.TX #TeaParty: http://tr.im/rvhz. Optimistic that Obama legacy will be new gen of leaders rising up to defend liberty. #tcot
On July 4, I'll be speaking at the E. TX Tea Party in Lufkin.  Thousands of citizens standing up for economic liberty.  http://tiny.cc/WmfS7
TWO DAYS TO GO. Need your help. 1st finance report due 6/30. Pls contribute before 6/30. Thx! Redstate.com posting:  http://alturl.com/c3wr
FOUR DAYS TO GO. Need your help. Our 1st finance report due 6/30. Pls contribute before 6/30; immensely helpful. Thx! http://tiny.cc/oq9Wc
NEED YOUR HELP: Our first finance report is due June 30. Pls contribute before 6/30; will be immensely helpful. Thx!  http://tiny.cc/oq9Wc
Modesta shot the largest crocodile ever recorded.Giving a political speech staring at the jaws of an 18 1/2 foot Nile croc is pretty unique!
Terrific fundraising event last night in Midland. Clayton & Modesta Williams hosted it at their home. Event was packed, lots of excitement.
A remarkable -- and quite typical -- story about Justice Thomas:  http://tiny.cc/tHU7L
My speech to the Fort Bend County Tea Party is on YouTube:  http://tiny.cc/G1lU8  Pls check it out, forward it on, and visit tedcruz.org
Worthwile NRO article: Tea Party movement should get behind passing Reagan's Economic Bill of Rights.   http://tiny.cc/tKHlj
Excellent WSJ making same point Von Mises made in Bureacracy: w/o a profit motive, govt is ALWAYS less efficient. http://tinyurl.com/pw8j3y
Wash Post editorial page calling out Obama Administration for its far-left economic policy and Chicago-style thuggery.  http://tiny.cc/ujHpZ
Very kind video interview w/ Mark Hemingway, writer who wrote a terrific profile of the TX AG race in National Review.  http://tiny.cc/5EktP
My dear friend Jay Nordlinger has written a very, very kind profile of the TX AG race today on National Review Online.  http://tiny.cc/X4ad0
This is really powerful, and worth watching:  CatholicVote.org's new media campaign "Life: Imagine the Potential."  http://tiny.cc/aVDB7
WSJ op-ed, both powerful & important: "Advocates of free enterprise must learn from the growing grass-roots protests."  http://tiny.cc/wwWpw
New video: My remarks to the Ft Bend County Tea Party.  What a moving experience to stand with so many inspired citizens.  www.tedcruz.org

Very kind profile about my AG race from the most recent issue of National Review magazine: 
http://tinyurl.com/dxxyc9
Powerful indictment of President Obama's foreign policy efforts. Chilling. And dangerous.  http://tiny.cc/lLO6E
On Wed 4/15,am speaking at the Ft Bend County Tea Party--citizens fighting for free enterprise and against collecivism. http://tiny.cc/m3h00
Krauthammer:  Excellent, as always -- http://tiny.cc/XMsvz
More from the YCT speech. Apparently, my career as a comic impersonator may be limited....  http://tiny.cc/00Fqm
R.G.Ratcliffe posts a link to video from a speech I gave today to the Young Conservatives of TX. Pls check it out. http://tinyurl.com/2qse3l
Wow. This is powerful. Even with its eco-friendly message, can we imagine GM, now owned by US govt, running such an ad? http://tiny.cc/oBfla
I'll be speaking on April 3 to the Young Conservatives of TX Annual State Convention. Please come join us, if you can. http://tiny.cc/ILs7y
Good news on the campaign trail -- Lubbock Avalanche-Journal columnist describes Ted Cruz as a "rising political star": http://tiny.cc/ckRJY
Caroline Camille (11 months) took her very first steps yesterday.  Absolutely adorable.  Then she asked for the car keys....
Wow. This is fabulous:  http://tinyurl.com/dbwfmp  Can we get this fellow to come to America, maybe provide some level-headed thinking here?
Am speaking at the Harris County Republican Party Lincoln Day dinner on Thursday.
Every day, our campaign for Attorney General of Texas is getting more and more support. Please come check out our website: www.tedcruz.org
Headlines we haven't seen these past eight weeks:  http://tiny.cc/a1Ekr            I wonder why not?
Francisco d'Anconia's money speech -- sage thoughts in a time of galloping collectivism:  http://tiny.cc/GBTwr
@tedfrank Appreciate the sentiments, sir.  Actually, a whole lot of people outside of TX getting active (esp on fundraising).  Very welcome.
@CarlosAmaral Thank you, sir.  Am grateful for the kind words, and the support for my AG campaign.
The Fifth Circuit appeals court today upheld the TX Moment of Silence Law, a case I argued and won in district court.  http://tiny.cc/VdnzF
Remarkable:  Cincinnati Tea Party -- Thousands Rally Downtown Against Government Spending  http://www.wlwt.com/news/18937373/detail.html
@MSDFTexan Sorry to miss you.  Will be talking about fighting for conservative principles and defending Texas before the U.S. Supreme Court.
@nathanielward Thx.  Glad to be on Twitter.  Appreciate the kind words.  Fed Soc debate was much fun.
I'll be speaking on Tuesday morning to the Greater Houston Council of Federated Republican Women.
@superfan99 Fantastic!  That's very, very cool.
